results.title: Metformin Alleviates Autistic-Like Behaviors Elicited by High-Fat Diet Consumption and Modulates the Crosstalk Between Serotonin and Gut Microbiota in Mice
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ has also been shown to alleviate @DISEASE_Anxiety @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@-like behavior induced by a HFD and to ameliorate some abnormal behaviors in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Autistic_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001321 @@@autism@@@.

results.title: Hyperandrogenism? Increased 17, 20-Lyase Activity? A Metanalysis and Systematic Review of Altered Androgens in Boys and Girls with Autism
results.text_hl: Medications already used in @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ might be considered to treat @DISEASE_Hyperandrogenism @DISEASE_MESH:D017588 @@@hyperandrogenism@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Autistic_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001321 @@@autism@@@ following further research.

results.text_hl: In consequence, the usability of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for disorders such as @<m>DISEASE_Autistic_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001321 @@@autism@@@ remains vague.

results.title: Novel potential of metformin on valproic acid-induced autism spectrum disorder in rats: involvement of antioxidant defence system.
results.text_hl: Similarly, @CHEMICAL_Valproic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014635 @@@VPA@@@-induced increase in @GENE_ACHE @GENE_83817 @@@acetylcholinesterase@@@ activity in the hippocampus and PFC were attenuated by postnatal treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. Findings from this study showed that postnatal administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ prevented @CHEMICAL_Valproic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014635 @@@valproic acid@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Autistic_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001321 @@@autistic-like behaviour@@@.

citations.NLM: Ishola IO, Balogun AO, Adeyemi OO. Novel potential of metformin on valproic acid-induced autism spectrum disorder in rats: involvement of antioxidant defence system. Fundam Clin Pharmacol. 2020 Dec;34(6):650-661. PMID: 32415700
